input.sentences: we were excited to be at riverfest !
we couldnt wait to enjoy some delicious grilled food .
the bands had begun and they were sounding great !
there is no way i was going to be going on this ride .

output.sentences: We can't wait to eat the grilled food.
The amazing sounding bands have begun.
I wanted to go on a ride.
There were even people jumping into the lake.
